sentence.Network_en: She had married a charming but rather vague Englishman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她嫁给了一个外表迷人实际却很迷糊的英国人。

sentence.Network_en: I realise that an Englishman who generalises about Ireland invites trouble.
sentence.Network_cn: 我意识到英国人如果对爱尔兰问题加以泛化的话会招惹麻烦。

sentence.Network_en: She is married to an Englishman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她嫁给了一个英格兰人。

list.abs: they all went to sleep except the young englishman ., 他们都去睡觉了 , 除了那个年轻的英国人.
he speaks english like a real englishman ., 他说起英语来像是一个真正的英国人.

when the waiter came , the englishman opened his mouth , put his fingers in it , took them out again and moved his lips .当服务员来的的时候，那个英国男人张开了嘴巴，把手指放进了嘴里，又拿出来的同时在移动他的嘴唇。

entry.def: An Englishman is a man who comes from England.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who is a native or inhabitant of England

auth_sentence.content: An Englishman who had been racked...by the Spanish Inquisition.
auth_sentence.res_content: An Englishman who had been racked...by the Spanish Inquisition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An Englishman who had been racked...by the Spanish Inquisition.

auth_sentence.content: She begged her father not to kill the Englishman.
auth_sentence.res_content: She begged her father not to kill the Englishman.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She begged her father not to kill the Englishman.

auth_sentence.content: First Englishman to raise the World Cup aloft.
auth_sentence.res_content: First Englishman to raise the World Cup aloft.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: First Englishman to raise the World Cup aloft.

sentences.en: I was astonished that he was not an Englishman.
sentences.cn: 我很惊讶,他竟不是英国人。

sentences.en: My teacher is an Englishman with golden hair.
sentences.cn: 我的老师是一个金黄色头发的英国人。

sentences.en: She stared thoughtfully at the Englishman across the table.
sentences.cn: 她若有所思地盯着桌子对面的那个英国人。

sentences.en: An Englishman calls himself young at fifty.
sentences.cn: 英国人五十岁还说自己年轻。
